text.__SUMMARY__: Aloe aaata is a species of aloe plant found in Saudi Arabia specifically in the Asir Province.  The aloe has a perennial life cycle and has evergreen leaves, additionally cuttings of the stem can be used for propagation of the plant along with offsets.
